title: Hello! Type ID situation
content:
hi everybody. i’m looking for the font that says “swiss made” in the picture below. that “s” is really important to me. If anyone could direct me to where i can buy this one, he will be the font hero of the day.

thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [SWISS MADE-.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111220040/http:/typophile.com/files/SWISS%20MADE-.jpg) | 12.47 KB |

 [‹ Bosnian Grammar 1890 - Typefaces?](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111220040/http:/typophile.com/node/38976 "Go to previous forum topic") [Can you name this font, please? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111220040/http:/typophile.com/node/38987 "Go to next forum topic")
author: danielev_y

comments.content: I would guess that it was hand drawn. Looks old.
the thing is that you can see it on new products as well...

Patty, it’s about the sans …

I know this one is not a 100% match, but maybe it could work for you:  
 [Stainless Extended Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111220040/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Stainless/styles) by [Cyrus Highsmith](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111220040/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Cyrus%252BHighsmith).
